messages.content: What is the function of the Make Square Node custom node?
It pads an image to make it square with a chosen filling strategy.
How does the TextEncodeAIO node differ from the A1111 extension?
The text encoding behavior of the TextEncodeAIO node is inspired by the A1111 extension.
How do I install the comfy-pants custom nodes?
Clone the repo to the `custom_nodes` folder and install the dependencies using pip.
